channel.title: Long time no see?
channel.description:
Sup. I haven't been on this website in like two years :rolleyes:
Anything cool happened to MoparScape since then?

item.title: Long time no see?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

You’ll soon regret coming back to MoparScape, or RSPS overall.

-Nearly all servers are leeched and vaguely edited DeltaScape.
-Tutorial section sucks ass. The tutorials are all boring and you’ve got better luck searching on r-s. Go ahead and argue with me, but the staff ruined the forums.
-There’s this section.
-Clients are all the same, and boring.
-Oh, let’s not forget the server advertisement. Due to pure stupidity, you can only advertise on the server status, with the advertisement board still here.

It’s mainly gonna be the staff to argue with my second reason. You just sit and watch. They’re thinking of the forums and not the people, so they can give a shit less if people want it back or not.

Read full topic

item.title: Long time no see?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:4, topic:280766”][quote author=Slivion link=topic=370824.msg2802290#msg2802290 date=1243519191]
Yes, the tutorial section has been ruined. The staff ruin the forum anyway and, there was no point coming back as I guess you’ll leave soon like every good coder in the past.
[/quote]
How was the tutorial section ruined?

EDIT: I don’t think we’ve ruined anything, but I think private messages like this threaten to ruin the integrity of the upper echelon of this community. :rolleyes:

Dear Sir/Madam,
I am writing to ask if it would be possible for you to post a thread within the MoparScape Veteran section asking the other team members if they agree or disagree with me becoming a MoparScape Veteran. I’ve been with this community for around two and a half years now and I would say i’m a helpful experience member of our community.

Date Registered: February 12, 2007, 03:32:57 pm

I would like to become a MoparScape Veteran because I think i’m suitable to help the community become a better/peaceful place. I agree that the forum is working well but it wouldn’t hurt to increase the amount of help within the team.

Thankyou very much,
Slivion.

and

[quote author=Slivion link=action=profile;u=85491 date=1242576161]
Dear Sir/Madam,
I am writing to ask for your vote to become a MoparScape Veteran. I am a helpful member of this community and have been in the forum for two and a half years.

Date Registered: February 12, 2007, 03:32:57 pm

I think it would be great if I became a MoparScape Veteran because i’m helpful, experience and great with working with others. I have been through tough times with MoparScape things and I think I could help people that may be stuck in the same situations. I’m willing to keep this community an even greater please.

Please get back to me if you are willing to create a thread within the MoparScape Veteran section asking the other members of the community.

Thankyou very much,
Slivion.
[/quote][/quote]
okl we’re asking lothy to get vet, i’ll send about 50 to you by tomorrow

Read full topic

It’s much better than the ones at Ikiliki’s and Kevin’s sites where you have to search through pages of unexplained copy and paste shit to find something decent.
